title: Dust and Disbelief
goal: Kaelen reaches a settlement, tries to understand the new society, and finds his warnings dismissed.

beats.summary: Kaelen makes his way to a nearby village or outpost, observing the customs and language of its inhabitants.
He attempts to inquire about ancient history or legends, but his questions are met with confusion or dismissal.
He encounters a local elder or authority figure who views him as a madman or a relic, ignoring his vague warnings of impending doom.
